review: Thank goodness I have a "with it" 18 year old son who told me I really needed this Amazon Fire Stick!  It's GREAT.  Now I can watch all the great things that I've been using my Kindle Fire for, except now it's on my TV!  AND I can show people my pictures that I have stored in the Cloud on the TV as well.  It is well worth the money!
author: Deborah Weaver

review: I bought this device to stream video to a second TV after using a ROKU for over a year. Nice menus and presentation, however, I believe it still needs work. Constant pauses and stoppages to buffer data stream are a problem although I have only used it for Showtime Play so far. I do not see the pauses and streaming stutter on the ROKU on the same WIFI connection and teh same channel. I think I'd wait a while to let them get the bugs fixed.
